publisher: Berlin/Boston De Gruyter De Gruyter Mouton
description: This manual contains overviews on language acquisition and distinguishes between first- and second-language acquisition. It also deals with Romance languages as foreign languages in the world and with language acquisition in some countries of the Romance-speaking world. This reference work will be helpful for researchers, students, and teachers interested in language acquisition in general and in Romance languages in particular.
series: Manuals of Romance Linguistics 2$$QManuals of Romance Linguistics
